text: Q25. Suppose in an input file X appears with probability 0.4, Y appears with probability 0.2, and Z appears with probability 0.4. Which of the following cannot be a Huffman code for the sequence XYYZXYZ? [Select alphabetical order in case of equal probabilities. Write 1 at right child of the node of the tree and write O at left child of the node of the Huffman tree] (a) 100000110011 (b) 10111101011 (c) 010000101001 (d) 01010000101
